data.oai_dc:dc: Reproductive effort of Big Bluestem, Indiangrass and Little Bluestem

Data set contains estimates of flowering stem height (m), density (no. per sq. m) and production (grams per sq. m) and total seed weight (grams) and production (grams per sq. m) for big bluestem, indiangrass and little bluestem on 2 soil types (shallow and deep) with 6 burngrazing treatment combinations. Sampling done once a year in October (end of growing season). (Sampling design slightly altered from pre01.)
big bluestem|density|flow|flower stem density|flower stem height|indiangrass|little bluestem|seed|seed weight
